participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and reflective, he often shares his experiences and seeks to connect with others.
participant_1.background: I am a recovering alcoholic. I take many medications and some of them make me see things. I am a 45 year old male. I now live in the city. I grew up on a farm.

participant_2.name: Lucy
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, she enjoys simple pleasures and expresses herself through singing and play.
participant_2.background: When I grow up I want to be a dog. I am four years old. I like to eat chocolate candy. I like to look at blocks and sing about letters. I like to talk but people have a hard time understanding.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to eat chocolate candy and look at blocks.
That sounds like fun. I like to eat chocolate candy too.
I also like to sing about letters.
That's cool. I like to sing too.
What's your favorite song?
I don't have a favorite song. I like a lot of different songs.
I like songs about animals.
Me too. I like the song "Old MacDonald Had a Farm."
I like that song too. I like to sing it all the time.
Me too. It's a fun song to sing.
Do you like to play games?
Yes, I like to play games. I like to play board games and video games.
I like to play board games too. I like to play Monopoly and Scrabble.
I like those games too. I also like to play chess.
I've never played chess before. I'll have to try it sometime.
You should. It's a lot of fun.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome.
